title: Protests against police abuse don't look the same in 2020 as they used to
description: Eugene Scott, political reporter for The Washington Post, and MSNBC's Joshua Johnson join Chuck Todd to talk about the widespread protests against police abuse.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
